context: Hello! What kind of movies are you into?
i feel like watching something like Predator (1987) or Drive (2011) I like both of those
Okay, how about an older movie called Run (1991) ? It has the guy who played Dr. Dreamy on Grey's Anatomy, but his name is escaping me at the moment.
I have not seen it but it sounds great I'll put it on my to watch list I also enjoyed Deadpool (2016)
Also, if you like those types of movies, how about Reservoir Dogs (1992) ? I love Quentin.
I cant wait to see the second one I loved that movie
resp: Oh, Deadpool (2016) was great. I still want to see the 2nd one, too.
